settings.title: You're Not Alone on This Journey

settings.cta_subtext: Ready to write your own success story?

settings.quote: I was stuck in a role I'd outgrown but terrified of starting over. The Career Compass program helped me pivot to a leadership position that respects my need for work-life balance. No hustle culture, just practical guidance.
settings.name: Jennifer K.
settings.title: Operations Manager ‚Üí Director of Customer Success

settings.quote: After 12 years in finance, I thought I was trapped. The community support and step-by-step approach gave me confidence to transition into consulting. I'm finally doing work that aligns with my values.
settings.name: Michael T.
settings.title: Financial Analyst ‚Üí Independent Consultant

settings.quote: What I loved most was the whole-life consideration. They didn't just focus on my career‚Äîthey helped me design a transition that worked for my family too. I made the move without sacrificing what matters most.
settings.name: Priya S.
settings.title: HR Manager ‚Üí Learning & Development Lead
